translation.eng: After Kṛṣṇa killed Vṛṣabhāsura, Śrīmatī Rādhikā said to Him, “O Vṛṣabha-śatru! You are approaching us, but don’t touch us!” Hearing these words, with a single blow from His heel Kṛṣṇa manifested Śrī Śyāma-kuṇḍa. May that Śyāma-kuṇḍa, composed of exceptionally pure water, be my shelter.
